title: goinstall fails if GOBIN not setted
body:
by **aka.spin**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Install Go to non-default path with separate GOBIN. For example: install Go to
$HOME/test/go with GOBIN=$HOME/test/bin
2. Unset all GO* enviroment variables
3. Run goinstall <package>
4. ... get error (below)
5. Set GOBIN=$HOME/test/bin
6. Try again - package installed

What is the expected output?
Installed package

What do you see instead?
For example:
$goinstall github.com/hoisie/web.go
goinstall: installing container/vector: /***/***/test/go/bin/gomake: no such file or
directory

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
$GOOS=linux, $GOARCH=amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
18926649cda7 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
